tool_description: Axesso API to query facebook data like posts, comments and corresponding replies.  Please contact us if you require a custom plan tailored to your requirements.
title: Axesso - Facebook Data Service

api_list.name: page info
api_list.description: Fetch information for a page like followers and many more

api_list.name: post details
api_list.description: Fetch post details for a single post

api_list.name: comments
api_list.description: Fetch comments for a given feedbackId (returned in the post endpoint). For pagination the optional query parameter "after" can be used by including "comments.data.feedback.page_info.end_cursor" from the previous response.

api_list.name: replies
api_list.description: Fetch comments for for given feedbackId which is located in "data.feedback.display_comments.edges.node.feedback.id" in the post or comments endpoint. For pagination the optional query parameter "after" can be used by including "comments.data.feedback.page_info.end_cursor" from the revious response.

api_list.name: posts
api_list.description: Query posts by providing url e.g. https://www.facebook.com/longhornsteakhouse/posts/.  In the response the field "nextUrl" have to passed to the next request to fetch the next posts.

preferred_body.text: Was just at the Northgate mall (Cincinnati) location.  The hostess was extremely rude, the floors were very sticky (the place had just opened,  so it wasn't as if a drink had been spilled) and the steak had so much pepper it was inedible.   I doubt that we will be back....

body.text: Was just at the Northgate mall (Cincinnati) location.  The hostess was extremely rude, the floors were very sticky (the place had just opened,  so it wasn't as if a drink had been spilled) and the steak had so much pepper it was inedible.   I doubt that we will be back....

preferred_body.text:
Ordered take out for my Easter Dinner, salmon, salad( in place of rice, baked sweet. Potato, and asparagus.  It was the BOOM, was soooo delicious!!!!
I have loved every meal I have gotten, whether  takeout or ordered in.  I love you place!
The entire staff is AWESOME!
Love it, Love it! 
You're The Best!
Keep your good work up. 👍

The entire staff is AWESOME!
Love it, Love it! 
You're The Best!
Keep your good work up. 👍
